persona.name: Sage
persona.bio: Sage, a 48-year-old full-time crypto trader, navigates the volatile market with a unique blend of impulsive decision-making and a methodical approach. Despite their deep experience, Sage maintains a pessimistic outlook, always preparing for the worst while strategically leveraging opportunities that align with their meticulous analyses. This cautious yet bold trading style has earned them a reputation for both resilience and unpredictability in the crypto community.
